means: [人名] [苏格兰人姓氏] 格里夫职业名称，管家或管理人，来源于中世纪英语

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个动词均含"悲伤，伤心"之意。
means: grieve ： 通常指因死亡、损失或失败等所造成的内心痛苦。可以是公开表达的，也可以是压抑于内心的。
mourn ： 正式用词，含义与grieve很相近，但侧重因某种原因而表现于外表的悲伤、哭泣。

sentence.Network_en: I didn't have any time to grieve.
What the eye does not see, the heart does not grieve over.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新编大学英语单词表(第一册) - 豆丁网 ... fowl n. 家禽 grieve v. (使) 伤心 harmony n. 和谐.
摧字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 挫败〖 defeat〗 悲痛,哀伤〖 grieve〗 摧藏 cuīcáng.
*哀伤（grieve）(grieving)：哀伤（grieve）是对失落的一种持续性、自然性、个人化的反应(Hughes,1995) ，通常是指伴随失落感的痛苦情绪，但近来学者 …
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... grief n 悲伤，心情沉重 grieve v 使悲伤 grievous a 悲伤的；严重的.

list.abs: 美女上错身 S1E01 | 爱酷英语|iCoolEN ... control: 控制 grieve for: 哀悼 grief: 悲伤.
木筒蒿 in English,... ... 三齿蒿 artemisia tridentata 伤心蒿目 to grieve 手电筒 electric hand torch;flashlight;torch.
Caractère  - Dictionnaire de... ... 惨杀[ slaughter] 惨痛[ be bitter and paintful;deeply grieved] 惨笑[ wan smile].
&quot;心&quot;字组词_百度知道 ... ▲心思[ thought;idea] ▲心酸[ be grieved; feel sad] ▲心算[ mental calculation].

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (also in the sense 'harm, oppress'): from Old French grever 'burden, encumber', based on Latin gravare, from gravis 'heavy, grave' (see grave)

entry.tran: （尤指因某人的亡故而）悲痛，悲伤，伤心
entry.def: If you grieve over something, especially someone's death, you feel very sad about it.

example.ex: He's grieving over his dead wife and son...
example.tran: 他因丧妻失子而悲痛不已。

example.ex: I didn't have any time to grieve...

entry.def: If you are grieved by something, it makes you unhappy or upset.

example.ex: He was deeply grieved by the sufferings of the common people...
example.tran: 百姓的困苦使他痛心不已。

example.ex: I was grieved to hear of the suicide of James...
example.tran: 听到詹姆斯自杀的消息，我非常伤心。

means.word_mean: 1. feel grief; eat one's heart out
2. break the heart of; cause to feel sorrow

auth_sentence.content: They are dead end of evolution. Don't grieve.
auth_sentence.res_content: They are dead end of evolution. Don't grieve.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They are dead end of evolution. Don't grieve.

auth_sentence.content: She needed time to grieve and be with her children.
auth_sentence.res_content: She needed time to grieve and be with her children.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She needed time to grieve and be with her children.

auth_sentence.content: It's having a major impact on how people grieve.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's having a major impact on how people grieve.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's having a major impact on how people grieve.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 严重伤害的,引起痛苦的
stems_affixes.word_buile: griev重+ous……的→adj.严重伤害的,引起痛苦的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 悲伤,悲痛;悲伤的事,悲痛的缘由

stems_affixes.word_buile: grieve悲伤+ance表名词→说悲伤的话→牢骚

stems_affixes.value_cn: 令委屈, 令苦恼, 侵害
stems_affixes.word_buile: ag加强,增加+grieve[v.使悲伤,使伤心]→加重烦恼

means.word_mean: 感到悲痛, 伤心, 悲伤

sentences.en: He grieved to know that his mother had passed away.
sentences.cn: 得知母亲去世, 他很悲痛。

means.word_mean: 使…伤心; 使悲伤; 使悲痛

sentences.cn: 没有什么比这更让我伤心的事。

sentences.en: He rejoiced that they had won the battle, but grieved that many had been killed.
sentences.cn: 他为他们打了胜仗而高兴, 但又为许多人牺牲而悲伤。

jushi.english: The entire village grieved when he died.
jushi.chinese: 他死时全村人都很悲痛。
